channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- Jetson TX2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- Jetson TX2

item.title: CVE-2019-5673|2024-08-04T20:01:52.043Z -- nvidia -- jetson%20tx2
item.description: NVIDIA Jetson TX2 contains a vulnerability in the kernel driver (on all versions prior to R28.3) where the ARM System Memory Management Unit (SMMU) improperly checks for a fault condition, causing transactions to be discarded, which may lead to denial of service.
